Summary So far I've had a fun and diverse career, going from "chips to chips!" The ride began as a Manufacturing Engineer at Frito-Lay for my college internship, to ending up now as a Project Analyst at Intel in chip design!  
 
Following my foray in the food industry, I've enjoyed great jobs while touring the high-tech industry from Varian Associates in Palo Alto, to Apple in Sacramento, to HP in Roseville, and now Intel in Folsom.
